description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
	New Features:

SLIDESNET-33630	Support for changing particular series point color
SLIDESNET-33728	Add support for hiding the chart series lines for StacedkBar charts


	Investigations:

SLIDESNET-33826	Can one Use Aspose.Slides with Visual fox pro


	Enhancement:

SLIDESNET-33825	Improve text layout algorithm to support different type of spaces


	Bugs:

SLIDESNET-33133	NullReferenceException on changing the chart series marker color
SLIDESNET-33469	Setting label positioning corrupts the presentation
SLIDESNET-33700	Wrong chart rendering on thumbnail
SLIDESNET-33723	The wrong text of a chart title in the generated thumbnail
SLIDESNET-33725	Vertical aligned footer, date and slide number are missing in exported PDF
SLIDESNET-33818	Slide master gets changed on cloning slides
SLIDESNET-33862	Wrong text shadow color rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-33863	NullPointerException on presentation cloning
SLIDESNET-33865	Text on some autoshapes is rendered offsetted when shape is flipped or text in textframe is rotated
SLIDESNET-33876	The angle of tilt of a 3D pie chart is different from that of in PPTX
SLIDESNET-33878	The chart dotted line is improperly rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-33887	The comma character is rendered at wrong position in generated PDF
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
